item.name: 1 - If the currently selected table is a passive-link table then just refresh it without prompting, else display prompt for selected tables.
2 - If currently selected table is passive-link table display dialog: refresh current table, or refresh multiple selected tables?

page.description: Displays a dialog to select which passive-link tables to refresh
page.discussion: The A5_RefreshPassiveLinkTableDialog() function displays a dialog that allows you to select whether to refresh the currently selected passive-link table or selected passive-link tables. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
